description: Returns information about one or more of your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distributions.

parameters.name: distributionName
parameters.description: The name of the distribution for which to return information. When omitted, the response includes all of your distributions in the Amazon Web Services Region where the request is made.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetDistributions request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: distributions
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe your distributions.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the distribution.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about your Lightsail distribution. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the distribution was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The Lightsail resource type ( Distribution).

nested_items.name: alternativeDomainNames
nested_items.description: The alternate domain names of the distribution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the distribution.

nested_items.name: isEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the distribution is enabled.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the distribution.

nested_items.name: bundleId
nested_items.description: The ID of the bundle currently applied to the distribution.

nested_items.name: certificateName
nested_items.description: The name of the SSL/TLS certificate attached to the distribution, if any.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the origin resource.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the origin resource (Instance).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The AWS Region name of the origin resource.

nested_items.name: protocolPolicy
nested_items.description: The protocol that your Amazon Lightsail distribution uses when establishing a connection with your origin to pull content.

nested_items.name: responseTimeout
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, that the distribution waits for a response after forwarding a request to the origin. The minimum timeout is 1 second, the maximum is 60 seconds, and the default (if you don't specify otherwise) is 30 seconds.

nested_items.name: originPublicDNS
nested_items.description: The public DNS of the origin.

nested_items.name: defaultCacheBehavior
nested_items.description: An object that describes the default cache behavior of the distribution.

nested_items.name: behavior
nested_items.description: The cache behavior of the distribution.

cache - This option is best for static sites. When specified, your distribution caches and serves your entire website as static content. This behavior is ideal for websites with static content that doesn't change depending on who views it, or for websites that don't use cookies, headers, or query strings to personalize content.

dont-cache - This option is best for sites that serve a mix of static and dynamic content. When specified, your distribution caches and serve only the content that is specified in the distribution's CacheBehaviorPerPath parameter. This behavior is ideal for websites or web applications that use cookies, headers, and query strings to personalize content for individual users.

nested_items.name: cacheBehaviorSettings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the cache behavior settings of the distribution.

nested_items.name: defaultTTL
nested_items.description: The default amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the content has been updated.

nested_items.name: minimumTTL
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the object has been updated.

nested_items.name: maximumTTL
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of time that objects stay in the distribution's cache before the distribution forwards another request to the origin to determine whether the object has been updated.

nested_items.name: allowedHTTPMethods
nested_items.description: The HTTP methods that are processed and forwarded to the distribution's origin.
GET,HEAD - The distribution forwards the GET and HEAD methods.
GET,HEAD,OPTIONS - The distribution forwards the GET, HEAD, and OPTIONS methods.
GET,HEAD,OPTIONS,PUT,PATCH,POST,DELETE - The distribution forwards the GET, HEAD, OPTIONS, PUT, PATCH, POST, and DELETE methods.

nested_items.name: cachedHTTPMethods
nested_items.description: The HTTP method responses that are cached by your distribution.
GET,HEAD - The distribution caches responses to the GET and HEAD methods.
GET,HEAD,OPTIONS - The distribution caches responses to the GET, HEAD, and OPTIONS methods.

nested_items.name: forwardedCookies
nested_items.description: An object that describes the cookies that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the cookies that are forwarded.

nested_items.name: option
nested_items.description: Specifies which cookies to forward to the distribution's origin for a cache behavior: all, none, or allow-list to forward only the cookies specified in the cookiesAllowList parameter.

nested_items.name: cookiesAllowList
nested_items.description: The specific cookies to forward to your distribution's origin.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: forwardedHeaders
nested_items.description: An object that describes the headers that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the headers that are forwarded.

nested_items.name: option
nested_items.description: The headers that you want your distribution to forward to your origin and base caching on.
all - Forward all headers to your origin.
none - Forward only the default headers.
allow-list - Forward only the headers you specify using the headersAllowList parameter.

nested_items.name: headersAllowList
nested_items.description: The specific headers to forward to your distribution's origin.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: forwardedQueryStrings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the query strings that are forwarded to the origin. Your content is cached based on the query strings that are forwarded.

nested_items.name: option
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the distribution forwards and caches based on query strings.

nested_items.name: queryStringsAllowList
nested_items.description: The specific query strings that the distribution forwards to the origin.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: cacheBehaviors
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the per-path cache behavior of the distribution.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path to a directory or file to cached, or not cache. Use an asterisk symbol to specify wildcard directories ( path/to/assets/*), and file types ( *.html, *jpg, *js). Directories and file paths are case-sensitive.
Specify the following to cache all files in the document root of an Apache web server running on a Lightsail instance. var/www/html/
Specify the following file to cache only the index page in the document root of an Apache web server. var/www/html/index.html.
Specify the following to cache only the .html files in the document root of an Apache web server. var/www/html/*.html.

Specify the following to cache only the .jpg, .png, and .gif files in the images sub-directory of the document root of an Apache web server. var/www/html/images/*.jpg var/www/html/images/*.png var/www/html/images/*.gif Specify the following to cache all files in the images sub-directory of the document root of an Apache web server. var/www/html/images/

nested_items.name: behavior
nested_items.description: The cache behavior for the specified path.
cache - This behavior caches the specified path.
dont-cache - This behavior doesn't cache the specified path.

nested_items.name: ableToUpdateBundle
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to your distribution, specified using the distributionName parameter, can be changed to another bundle.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The IP address type of the distribution.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: viewerMinimumTlsProtocolVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum TLS protocol version that the distribution can use to communicate with viewers.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
